frontmatter.title: Observables
frontmatter.description: Nowadays we often hear the term Reactive Programming, Reactive Extensions, RXJava and all the hype around them but you can’t get your head around them or may be you’ve seen it used a few places but you’re still a little confused and would like some clarifications. I’ll try to make this post easy and simple for you.
